Name: Custom Starter Package Builder GUI
Author: tbonehunter
Description: A standalone visual configuration tool for the Custom Starter Package mod. Configure your starting items before launching Stardew Valley - no JSON editing required!

Requirements.Name: Content Patcher
Requirements.Author: Pathoschild
Requirements.Description: Required for the generated content pack

Features: Browse items by category (Objects, Craftables, Tools, Weapons, Boots, Hats, Trinkets)
Configurable max item limit (default 5, adjustable in GUI)
Creates a Content Patcher pack for Custom Starter Package

Instructions: 1. Download and extract the archive to any location
2. Ensure Custom Starter Package mod is installed in your Stardew Valley Mods folder
3. Ensure Content Patcher mod is installed in your Stardew Valley Mods folder
5. Select your desired starting items (adjust max limit if needed)
6. Click 'Export to Content Pack' to create the content pack
7. Launch Stardew Valley and start a new game to receive your items

Credits.Name: aedenthorn
Credits.Role: Original Custom Starter Package mod author

1.1.0: BREAKING: Now exports as Content Patcher pack (required by Custom Starter Package)
Configurable max item limit (no longer hard-coded to 5)
Added Content Patcher as a requirement
Updated UI: 'Export to Content Pack' button, 'Mods Folder' selector

Notes: This is a STANDALONE application, not a SMAPI mod
Run this tool BEFORE launching Stardew Valley
Custom Starter Package loads items at game startup, so in-game configuration is not possible
The tool creates a '[CP] Custom Starter Package Config' folder in your Mods directory
The ItemDataExtractor companion mod can be used to extract updated item data from the game
